name: Obsolete Detterence
description:
A 1v1 fighting game with inspiration from Guilty Gear Street fighter and Mortal Kombat. My goal was to make a legit fighting game you can play in a browser. Has special commands, combo system based on links, high low blocking the whole 9 yards. Only has 1 character now but If it's popular I'll add more.  You can download the windows exe if you want to too. I wanted to emphasize skill so there is no combo damage scaling. Has training mode VS CPU mode and 2 Player modes

Controls P1 arrowkeys J:Light K:Heavy. P2 WASD F:Light G:Heavy ESC to go back to menu

Movement:
Run→→(hold) can cancel into dashjump or dash super jump by →→🡕 or →→🡖🡕
SuperJump ↓↑
Backdash ← ←(invincitbility frames on startup)
AirDash ← ←or→→ in air (can IAD like Guilty Gear 

Special moves: 
F.W.T.W Knee: ←🡗↓🡖→ Heavy 
Deeds of Flesh →↓🡖 Light (can do on both air and ground. Invincible startup and active frames)
Neckbreaker Thow Heavy (only when very close and enemy is close and not in air hitstun or blockstun, 1frame startup)

Normal moves
stand light relatively fast good anti air +on block, High
stand heavy: Slow -on block far range Mid
crouch light fastest move, neutral on block short range low
crouch heavy Knocksdown, Punishable on bock long recovery. low
jump light air to air overhead
jump heavy air to ground overhead

background image by https://craftpix.net/
